name: Haze (itch) (Siyokoy)
description:
You wake up with no memories of the night prior. You only know one thing: you have lost your ring, and you must find it.

Haze is a short linear visual novel about a man dealing with his grief. Created for NaNoRenO 2023.

CONTENT WARNINGS: Alcoholism and mild suicidal ideation

Hello! This is Siyokoy, the creator of this game. Thank you for giving it a try! This is my first time finishing a VN. I recommend keeping the audio on. There are no CGs for the sake of my own sanity.
